page.title: 09A Typical Day For Me.
page.content: {I get up}at 7 o'clock and play schools. For{breakfast}I have cereal and toast. My dad drives my brother and I to{school}in the car. Then he and my mum go to{work.}Before the bell rings at 9 o'clock I line up with my friends. In school the teacher marks the register then the whole school goes to assembly. After this we do mathematics or writing. Best of all I like doing maths. The first playtime is at 10.30am. My favourite{game}is leapfrog. After lunch I have about half an hour to play again. Afternoon school finishes at 3.15pm. I stay for Drama, Craft, Recorder and Rounders {Clubs}after school. When I get home I watch television or play on my bike. On Wednesdays I go to 'Explorers' and on Fridays I go to Brownies.{I go to {bed}at 8.00pm. Before I go to sleep I do my 'Quest' which is a Bible Quiz.
